What's in a Blueprint?

Sources (3-6)

Curated documentation URLs from official vendor pages, pricing, and model cards.

Scenarios (1-2)

Pre-configured workload definitions with SLOs, budget, and compliance settings.

Stacks (1-2)

Recommended model, framework, and hardware configurations.
